name: Sky Sojourn
description:
Welcome to the exciting world of Sky Sojourn!
In this adventure game you will play as Steve, a brave adventurer who finds himself on a remote deserted island full of mysteries and riddles.

Your task is to climb up a variety of floating islands. To reach the top, you will have to overcome many exciting obstacles. Be ready for unusual challenges!

The peculiarity of the game are pushing spheres and elevators that will help you climb to the top!

The higher you go up the more painful it is to fall as there are no saves in the game and if you fall from a great height the game will be over. But the main thing is not to give up and you will definitely be able to overcome all the obstacles and find out what is at the top!
